name: A pair of skeletal hands
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users charisma adequately.
It increases the users hitpoints adequately.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'offensive efficiency'.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'throw'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'juggling'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'acrobatics'.
The hands assist in the conjuring and handling of magical projectiles.
